properties.name: BaseWidgetExport
properties.description: Configures the exporting and printing features.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: Specifies the color that will fill transparent regions in the resulting file or document.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Enables the client-side exporting in the UI component.

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: Specifies a default name for the file to which the UI component will be exported.

properties.name: formats
properties.description: Specifies a set of export formats.

properties.name: margin
properties.description: Adds an empty space around the exported UI component; measured in pixels.

properties.name: printingEnabled
properties.description: Enables the printing feature in the UI component. Applies only if the **export**.[enabled] property is **true**.

properties.name: svgToCanvas
properties.description: A function that renders SVG markup on the HTML canvas. Required to export custom SVG elements (for example, [markerTemplate]).
